dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5175 IH: Protecting Americans from Illegal Bailouts Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lance (for himself and Mr. Cassidy) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to repeal the risk corridor program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Americans from Illegal Bailouts Act of 2014.

section.header: Repeal of the risk corridor program established in PPACA

subsection.text: Section 1342 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 18062) is repealed.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as of the date of the enactment of this Act.
